header: 英语语法提高练习题（一）

questions.question: The spaceship travels through ______ to the moon.
questions.cn: 太空船穿过太空飞向月球。

questions.question: He is ______ I want to see.
questions.cn: 他是我最不想见到的人。

questions.question: I wish ______ an exam tomorrow.
questions.cn: 我希望明天没有考试。

questions.question: He sat in front of the TV with his eyes ______.
questions.cn: 他坐在电视机前,两眼紧闭。

questions.question: All of us don't like this ______ woman.
questions.cn: 我们所有人都不喜欢这个铁石心肠的女人。

questions.question: He tries his best to ______.
questions.cn: 他尽最大努力使收支相抵。

questions.question: He would rather ______ around than go home.
questions.cn: 他宁愿四处走走也不愿意回家。

questions.question: I ______ him, but don't know him personally.
questions.cn: 我听说过他,但是并不认识他。

questions.question: The poor ______ often jealous of the rich.
questions.cn: 穷人经常妒忌富人。

questions.question: He likes outdoor games such as ______ football.
questions.cn: 他喜欢户外运动比如踢足球。

questions.question: He is bound to ______ if he doesn't work hard.
questions.cn: 如果他不努力,他必然会失败。

questions.question: Five years ______ since I last saw you.
questions.cn: 从我上次见到你已经过了五年了。

questions.question: This piece of music ______ my hometown.
questions.cn: 这首乐曲使我想起我的故乡。

questions.question: Not once ______ as I have asked.
questions.cn: 你一次也没有按照我要求的去做。

questions.question: He ______ the piano when I came in.
questions.cn: 当我进房间时他正在弹钢琴。

questions.question: By the time he got there, all the children ______.
questions.cn: 当他到那里时,所有的孩子都走了。

questions.question: Our teacher assigned me to ______ this job.
questions.cn: 我们的老师指派我做这项工作。

questions.question: Joe always takes his time ______ any questions.
questions.cn: 乔回答任何问题都不慌不忙。

questions.question: Do you know the reason ______ he didn't come?
questions.cn: 你知道他没有来的原因吗?

questions.question: Please believe in me, ______ am your true friend.
questions.cn: 请相信我,我是你真正的朋友。

questions.question: The richer he becomes, the ______ he will be.
questions.cn: 他越富有,就越不善良。

questions.question: Dick is ______ is called a self-made man.
questions.cn: 迪克是人们所说的白手起家的人。

questions.question: He is not such a boy ______ you imagine.
questions.cn: 他不是你想像的那种男孩。

questions.question: Tom used ______ a walk every afternoon.
questions.cn: 汤姆以前每天下午都散步。

questions.question: They ______ such a foolish thing.
questions.cn: 他们反对做这种愚蠢的事。

questions.question: I suppose he is thinking it over, ______?
questions.cn: 我想他在仔细考虑,不是吗?

questions.question: If I were the governor, I ______ change certain things.
questions.cn: 如果我是州长,我就会改变某些事情。

questions.question: These kinds of movies are ______ little value.
questions.cn: 这类电影没有什么价值。

questions.question: This is the book I spoke ______.
questions.cn: 这就是我对你说过的书。

questions.question: Happiness does not always ______ being rich.
questions.cn: 幸福不是永远存在于富有中。

questions.question: ______ I could speak English as well as you!
questions.cn: 但愿我说英文能和你说得一样好!

questions.question: Tom would rather play tennis than ______ a walk.
questions.cn: 汤姆宁愿打网球也不愿散步。

questions.question: She is not in the ______ worrying about it.
questions.cn: 她一点也不为此担心。

questions.question: ______ Professor Smith were here to help us!
questions.cn: 要是史密斯教授在这里帮助我们该多好呀!

questions.question: I don't suppose you care for sport, ______?
questions.cn: 我想你不喜欢体育运动,是吗?

questions.question: We will go hiking on Sunday ______ it rains.
questions.cn: 即使星期日下雨我们也要去远足。

questions.question: On my way ______, I saw Miss Pierce.
questions.cn: 在我回家的路上,我看到了皮尔斯女士。

questions.question: He can neither stand up ______.
questions.cn: 他既不能站直也不能躺下。

questions.question: ______ will not take the exam.
questions.cn: 我的一些同学将不参加考试。
options: C. A few of my classmates
D. My a few of classmates

questions.question: I ______ supper when he came to see me.
questions.cn: 他来看我时我正在吃晚餐。

questions.question: This question is ______ that one.
questions.cn: 这个问题和那个问题一样难。

questions.question: I think you should get your car ______.
questions.cn: 我想你应该把你的车送修。

questions.question: He jumped down from up a tree and ______.
questions.cn: 他从树上跳下来受伤了。

questions.question: This mountain is ______ than that one.
questions.cn: 这座山比那座山高许多。

questions.question: Don't forget ______ the windows when you go out.
questions.cn: 在你出去时不要忘记关上窗户。

questions.question: The book is ______ I lost last week.
questions.cn: 这本书是我上星期遗失的那本。

questions.question: The doctor knew ______.
questions.cn: 医生知道他为什么发烧。
options: A. why he got a fever
B. why did he get a fever
C. what he got a fever

questions.question: This is the small town ______ he was born.
questions.cn: 这是他出生的小城镇。

questions.question: He is ______ everybody likes him.
questions.cn: 他是如此可爱的一个男孩,每个人都喜欢他。
options: A. a boy such lovely that
B. such lovely a boy that
C. so lovely a boy that
D. a boy so lovely that

questions.question: I still haven't found ______ I am looking for.
questions.cn: 我仍然没有找到我所寻找的东西。

header: 英语语法提高练习题（二）

questions.question: By the end of last term, we ______ Book Four.
questions.cn: 到上学期末为止,我们已经学完了第四册。

questions.question: The question is ______ the film is worth seeing or not.
questions.cn: 问题是这部电影是否值得看。

questions.question: We ______ Tom next week.
questions.cn: 下礼拜我们将会等汤姆。
options: C. is going to wait for

questions.question: The clock ______ well since it was fixed.
questions.cn: 这钟自从修好后就一直走得不错。

questions.question: I ______ for two hours when he came.
questions.cn: 他来时,我已看了两个小时书。

questions.question: The train ______ late, we all had to wait.
questions.cn: 火车误点了,所以我们全都得等。

questions.question: Give the book to ______ you think needs it.
questions.cn: 把这本书送给你认为需要的任何人。

questions.question: ______ you respect will respect you as well.
questions.cn: 你所尊敬的人会一样地尊敬你。

questions.question: The old building is ______ by the workers.
questions.cn: 这栋老建筑物正由工人们修缮。

questions.question: The errors ______ by my teacher.
questions.cn: 这些错误会由我的老师改正过来。

questions.question: You ______ have returned these books to the library.
questions.cn: 你早该将这些书还给图书馆了。

questions.question: He made a mark ______ he should forget.
questions.cn: 他做了一个记号以免忘记。

questions.question: I am sure ______ he said is true.
questions.cn: 我肯定他说的是真的。

questions.question: He talks as if he ______ abroad before.
questions.cn: 他谈话的样子好像他以前确实出过国。

questions.question: The sports meet ______.
questions.cn: 运动会将被延迟。
options: C. is to be put off

questions.question: Mary realized she ______.
questions.cn: 玛丽意识到她正在被人捉弄。
options: B. was being made fun of

questions.question: We'll produce ______ we did last year.
questions.cn: 我们将生产比去年多百分之二十的拖拉机。

questions.question: Light blue is the best color ______.
questions.cn: 淡蓝色是最适合他的颜色。

questions.question: He works too hard and that's ______ his problem is.
questions.cn: 他工作太刻苦了,那就是他的问题所在。

questions.question: ______ the airport when the plane took off.
questions.cn: 我刚到机场飞机就起飞了。
options: A. Hardly I had got to
C. Hardly I had arrived at

questions.question: There are ten ______ in the horse-riding race.
questions.cn: 跑马赛有十名竞争者。

questions.question: He is a man with an ______ mind.
questions.cn: 他是一个思惟条理清楚的人。

questions.question: It's not a good idea to tell ______.
questions.cn: 说谎不是好办法。

questions.question: If he ______, I should go with him.
questions.cn: 倘若他去,我就和他一起去。

questions.question: If I were you, I ______ the lecture.
questions.cn: 如果我是你,我就会去听演讲了。

questions.question: He talked about Rome as though he ______ there.
questions.cn: 他谈论起罗马就像他去过那里似的。

questions.question: ______ the wonderful game!
questions.cn: 你要是能看到这场精彩的比赛该多好啊!
options: A. If you could have watched

questions.question: She ought to go by plane, ______?
questions.cn: 她应该搭飞机去,不是吗?

questions.question: I wish to call on you tonight, ______?
questions.cn: 我希望今晚去拜访你,可以吗?

questions.question: I don't think she can finish the work, ______?
questions.cn: 我不认为她能完成这项工作,对吗?

questions.question: I suppose he is not serious, ______?
questions.cn: 我想他不是认真的,是吗?

questions.question: Many a student ______ made the same mistake before.
questions.cn: 过去有很多学生犯过同样的错误。

questions.question: ______ were also invited to the dinner.
questions.cn: 史密斯全家也被邀请来吃晚餐。

questions.question: Two-thirds of the area ______ by trees.
questions.cn: 这个地区三分之二的地都种着树。

questions.question: I don't think he can finish the task, ______?
questions.cn: 我认为他不能完成任务,是吗?

questions.question: ______ has reviewed the lessons can pass this test.
questions.cn: 只要复习过课文的人都能通过这次考试。

questions.question: I ______ my heartfelt thanks to you.
questions.cn: 我向你们表示衷心的感谢。

questions.question: He ______ the experiment for three hours.
questions.cn: 他已经做了三个小时的实验了。

questions.question: The streetlights ______ on when night falls.
questions.cn: 天一黑路灯就亮了。

questions.question: It's a fantastic landscape that we ______.
questions.cn: 这奇妙的景观是我们前所未见的。

questions.question: I wish to go home now, ______?
questions.cn: 我想现在回家,好不好?

questions.question: She must be a college student, ______?
questions.cn: 她一定是个大学生,对吗?

questions.question: It ______ Mary and Tom who did the cleaning.
questions.cn: 是玛丽和汤姆做的大扫除。

questions.question: ______ you met the Englishman?
questions.cn: 你是在什么地方遇见那位英国人的?

questions.question: The museum is quite ______ being visited.
questions.cn: 这家博物馆很值得参观。

questions.question: Look around when ______ the street.
questions.cn: 过马路的时候要向左右看。

questions.question: It is no use ______ while you are exhausted.
questions.cn: 筋疲力倦时念书是没用的。

questions.question: Why did you leave the lights ______ all night long?
questions.cn: 你为何让灯亮了一夜?

questions.question: I haven't got a seat ______.
questions.cn: 我没座位可以坐。

questions.question: I regret ______ my teacher's advice.
questions.cn: 我后悔没有采纳老师的建议。

header: 英语语法提高练习题（三）

questions.question: Why do you stand there and watch the milk ______ over?
questions.cn: 你为何站在那里看着牛奶溢出来?

questions.question: I never feel satisfied if I don't find ______ answers.
questions.cn: 如果我没有找到令人满意的答案,我绝不感觉满足。

questions.question: ______ is more serious than that of money.
questions.cn: 失去健康比失去金钱更严重。

questions.question: Teaching is a worthwhile ______.
questions.cn: 教书是值得做的职业。

questions.question: The watch I bought yesterday is ______ yours.
questions.cn: 我昨天买的那块手表和你的相同。

questions.question: So far as I am ______, money is no problem.
questions.cn: 就我而言,金钱不成问题。

questions.question: Did the scientists put a satellite into ______ around Mars?
questions.cn: 这些科学家把人造卫星放入火星的轨道了吗?

questions.question: My mother bought me ______.
questions.cn: 我妈妈给我买了一条裤子。

questions.question: She is one of ______ students in the class.
questions.cn: 她是班上最富有想像力的学生之一。

questions.question: There is still no answer ______ this vital question.
questions.cn: 对这个非常重要的问题仍然没有答案。

questions.question: His house looks out on ______ ocean.
questions.cn: 他的房子面向一大片广阔的海洋。

questions.question: We can't help letting the matter ______.
questions.cn: 我们不能不让事情顺其自然。

questions.question: You'd better have your bad tooth ______ out.
questions.cn: 你最好把你的蛀牙拔掉。

questions.question: She was invited to join the ______ of the BBC.
questions.cn: 她曾受邀加入英国广播公司工作。

questions.question: His father is a ______, who sells flowers.
questions.cn: 他的父亲是位卖花的花商。

questions.question: This is more than ______ can bear.
questions.cn: 这是活生生的人所无法忍受的。

questions.question: Some distant stars are invisible to the ______ eye.
questions.cn: 有些远处的星星是肉眼看不见的。

questions.question: She likes to look at the ______ at night.
questions.cn: 她喜欢在夜晚观看天空。

questions.question: The ______ of the election was really a surprise.
questions.cn: 选举的结果真是令人惊讶。

questions.question: He was so ______ that he could barely stand.
questions.cn: 他醉得几乎不能站立。

questions.question: You must not ______ before you know all the facts.
questions.cn: 在你瞭解所有的事实之前,你绝不可以偏颇。

questions.question: He ______ a lot of pleasure from meeting new people.
questions.cn: 他从认识新人中得到很多乐趣。

questions.question: He made a ______ across the Pacific Ocean.
questions.cn: 他做了横渡太平洋的航行。

questions.question: The boy ______ reading a detective story.
questions.cn: 男孩专心地看侦探故事。

questions.question: I would never ______ such a thing.
questions.cn: 我从不会想到做这样的事情。

questions.question: I went swimming ______ the rain.
questions.cn: 虽然下雨我仍去游泳。

questions.question: Knowledge is important, and imagination is ______ important.
questions.cn: 知识是重要的,想像力也同样重要。

questions.question: Some people find it difficult to ______ ideas with others.
questions.cn: 一些人觉得同其他人交流思想很难。

questions.question: This museum is famous for its ______ of modern paintings.
questions.cn: 这个博物馆以其现代画收藏品而闻名。

questions.question: We have made every effort to ______ her.
questions.cn: 我们竭力安慰她。

questions.question: His ______ for power led him into a tragedy.
questions.cn: 他对权力的贪婪导致了他的悲剧。

questions.question: You'd better hang up that suit so it doesn't ______.
questions.cn: 你最好把那套衣服挂起来,这样它就不会起皱。

questions.question: ______ today is more convenient than years ago.
questions.cn: 今天的生活比起数年前更方便。

questions.question: Air pollution affects every ______ thing in the world.
questions.cn: 空气污染影响到世界上的每一种生物。

questions.question: This flower can ______ make food.
questions.cn: 这种花可以用来制造食品。

questions.question: We watched a nice movie ______.
questions.cn: 前天晚上我们看了一场精彩的电影。

questions.question: I have not ______ my daughter for years.
questions.cn: 我已经数年未收到我女儿的来信了。

questions.question: I have been ______ Taipei for a few days.
questions.cn: 我在台北已待了几天。

questions.question: ______ you know the answer is not important.
questions.cn: 你是否知道答案并不重要。

questions.question: I really don't know ______ to do next.
questions.cn: 我真不知道下一步做什么。

questions.question: It will be ______ before she gets well.
questions.cn: 她康复起来还要有一段时间。

questions.question: If you don't go, I shall not go, ______.
questions.cn: 如果你不走,我也不走。

questions.question: The police ______ for the thief.
questions.cn: 警方已经开始搜捕窃贼。

questions.question: Have you found out which part is ______ fault?
questions.cn: 你是否已经查出那个零件出了毛病?

questions.question: May I ask what the cranes stand ______?
questions.cn: 我可以问这些鹤象征什么吗?

questions.question: The ______ silence of night is very horrible.
questions.cn: 夜晚的异常寂静是很可怕的。

questions.question: A dog ran out ______ behind the gate.
questions.cn: 一只狗从大门后面跑了出来。

questions.question: The old man patted me ______.
questions.cn: 那位老人拍了拍我的后背。

questions.question: I don't think anybody will ______ that war.
questions.cn: 我认为没人能从那场战争中受益。

questions.question: It was cruel ______ him to hit such a little boy.
questions.cn: 他真是太残酷了,殴打这么小的一个男孩子。

header: 英语语法提高练习题（四）

questions.question: Wine doesn't ______ me; I like beer.
questions.cn: 葡萄酒不适合我的胃口,我喜欢啤酒。

questions.question: You are old enough to ______ your own living.
questions.cn: 你岁数不小了,应该自己谋生了。

questions.question: My health compels me to ______ work.
questions.cn: 我的健康状况迫使我停止工作。

questions.question: Why do you ______ thinking that way?
questions.cn: 你为什么坚持要那么想?

questions.question: I hesitated to ______ him what had really happened.
questions.cn: 我不愿意告诉他到底发生了什么事。

questions.question: He covered a distance ______.
questions.cn: 他走了五十英里长的路程。

questions.question: ______ animals sleep under the snow.
questions.cn: 好多动物在雪下睡觉。

questions.question: Seen from space, the earth ______.
questions.cn: 从太空中看,地球是圆的。

questions.question: Against the wall leans a ______ bench.
questions.cn: 靠墙放着一个三条腿的长凳。

questions.question: Can you ______ before you tell me the answer?
questions.cn: 在告诉我答案之前,你能确认一下吗?

questions.question: ______ waiting for Jane, he headed home.
questions.cn: 等珍等烦了,他回家去了。
options: D. To be fed up with

questions.question: You can take ______ room you prefer.
questions.cn: 你可以住你喜欢的任何一个房间。

questions.question: They all went out ______ the rain.
questions.cn: 尽管下雨,他们大家还是都出去了。

questions.question: If you are ______ worried, just stay at home.
questions.cn: 如果你很着急的话,就待在家里吧。

questions.question: The manager is well qualified ______ his position.
questions.cn: 这位经理完全胜任他的工作。

questions.question: I have no way to ______ Mr. Brown.
questions.cn: 我现在没办法和布朗先生联系。

questions.question: My car ______ so I had to come by bus.
questions.cn: 我的车坏了,所以我不得不坐公车来。

questions.question: ______ your valuable advice, I saved a lot of trouble.
questions.cn: 多亏你那有价值的建议,使我省去很多麻烦。

questions.question: ______ you are well again, you can travel.
questions.cn: 既然你已经恢复,你可以旅行了。

questions.question: If you have any questions, please ______ your hands.
questions.cn: 如果有什么疑问的话,请举手。

questions.question: Sorry, the book you need has been ______.
questions.cn: 对不起﹐你要的书现在已卖光了。

questions.question: Before you buy a new dress, you'd better ______.
questions.cn: 在你买新衣服之前,你最好先试穿一下。

questions.question: He is an artist ______ the name.
questions.cn: 他是一个名副其实的艺术家。

questions.question: I'll be back in half an hour ______.
questions.cn: 我最晚过半小时后回来。

questions.question: She ______ when she heard the news.
questions.cn: 当听到这个消息时她崩溃了。

questions.question: Burglars had ______ while we were away on holiday.
questions.cn: 我们出外度假时,小偷就已闯入屋内行窃。

questions.question: A dinner was given ______ Mr. Henry.
questions.cn: 这次晚餐是为纪念亨利先生举办的。

questions.question: John attended the meeting ______ Mike.
questions.cn: 约翰代替迈克出席了会议。

questions.question: I ______ him for what I had done.
questions.cn: 我为我所做的事向他道歉。

questions.question: ______ this watch, it can be guaranteed for three years.
questions.cn: 至于这表,它能保用三年。

questions.question: I am ______ for what to do.
questions.cn: 我不知道怎样办才好。

questions.question: You must ______ it if you want to succeed.
questions.cn: 如果你想成功,就必须坚持下去。

questions.question: If you ______ the truth, you have nothing to fear.
questions.cn: 只要你坚持真理,就没有什么可怕的。

questions.question: They ______ for a weekend in the country.
questions.cn: 他们离开这里去乡下度周末。

questions.question: My sister always ______ some stray cat or dog.
questions.cn: 我妹妹一向可怜那些流浪的猫狗。

questions.question: George ______ all that his parents did for him.
questions.cn: 乔治认为他父母为他做的一切都是理所当然的。

questions.question: Ought children to ______ late watching TV programs?
questions.cn: 儿童熬夜看电视应该吗?

questions.question: I need to get my own problems ______.
questions.cn: 我需要让自己的问题得到解决。

questions.question: Everyone that knows him ______ him.
questions.cn: 每一个认识他的人都说他好。

questions.question: I think we ______ defeating them.
questions.cn: 我想我们有可能战胜他们。

questions.question: All my friends will ______ me.
questions.cn: 我的所有朋友都将支持我。

questions.question: The doctor advised me to ______ for a few days.
questions.cn: 医生劝我在家里待几天。

questions.question: He is ______ becoming a sailor.
questions.cn: 他一心想当一名水手。

questions.question: No one is ______ the global warming here.
questions.cn: 这里没有人不知道地球温度上升的事实。

questions.question: She went hot and cold ______.
questions.cn: 她一会儿发热一会儿发冷。

questions.question: I enjoyed the meal, ______ the conversation.
questions.cn: 我很喜欢那一顿饭,至于席上的谈话更是不必说了。

questions.question: The contract is to ______ at once.
questions.cn: 合同立即生效。

questions.question: Their dispute ______ a careless remark.
questions.cn: 他们争吵是由于一句不在意的话而引起的。

questions.question: Most young people ______ popular music.
questions.cn: 大多数年轻人喜欢通俗音乐。

questions.question: My grandson ______ the examination with no mistakes.
questions.cn: 我的孙子顺利地通过了考试,一个错儿也没出。

header: 英语语法提高练习题（五）

questions.question: I would like to ______ for all our classmates.
questions.cn: 我愿意为我们全班同学跑腿效力。

questions.question: No medicine can ______ discontent.
questions.cn: 没有药物能消除一个人的不满。

questions.question: The owners agreed to ______.
questions.cn: 雇主同意和罢工者妥协了。
options: B. meet the strikers by accident

questions.question: His wife has ______ influenza.
questions.cn: 他的妻子患流感,已经病倒了。

questions.question: The woman ______ in a few minutes.
questions.cn: 那女人几分钟后苏醒了。

questions.question: The storm ______ the crops.
questions.cn: 暴风雨使庄稼遭到很大损害。
options: B. did a lot of harm to

questions.question: Little did I ______ your doing such a thing.
questions.cn: 我做梦也想不到你会做这样的事。

questions.question: Your picture is good ______ some of the colors.
questions.cn: 你的画很好只是其中的有些色彩不太好。

questions.question: He answered all the questions ______ the last one.
questions.cn: 除了最后一题,他回答了所有的问题。

questions.question: He ______ love with her at first sight.
questions.cn: 他对她一见钟情。

questions.question: The left engine of the plane suddenly ______.
questions.cn: 飞机左边的发动机突然掉下了。

questions.question: Never do wrong ______ money.
questions.cn: 千万不要见利忘义。

questions.question: A new tax has been ______ cigarettes.
questions.cn: 对香烟已增收新税。

questions.question: ______ while you are arguing with others.
questions.cn: 你同别人辩论时,要保持冷静。

questions.question: I'm ______ visiting you next week.
questions.cn: 我期待着下星期拜访你。

questions.question: If you do not hurry, you may be late ______ school.
questions.cn: 如果你不赶快,上学可能要迟到。

questions.question: The wages due ______ him will be paid tomorrow.
questions.cn: 他应得的薪水明天付给他。

questions.question: We must limit the expense ______ what we can afford.
questions.cn: 我们必须把开支限制在我们能支付得起的范围内。

questions.question: He's always provided well ______ his family.
questions.cn: 他总是让家人丰衣足食。

questions.question: Your advice was very much ______.
questions.cn: 你的劝告非常中肯。

questions.question: Your son does not ______ you in any way.
questions.cn: 你儿子哪方面都不像你。

questions.question: Regardless ______ the danger, he climbed the tower.
questions.cn: 他不顾危险爬上了高塔。

questions.question: When will the publishers ______ his new novel?
questions.cn: 出版商何时出版他的新小说?

questions.question: People in the city are ______ than in small villages.
questions.cn: 城市里的人比小村庄里的人过得更舒服。

questions.question: Put on your raincoat ______ it rains.
questions.cn: 穿上雨衣,以防下雨。

questions.question: You'd better go and ask the headmaster ______.
questions.cn: 你最好亲自去问校长。

questions.question: They were ______ an escaped criminal.
questions.cn: 他们在追赶一个逃犯。

questions.question: Mr. Wang ______ the director during his absence.
questions.cn: 主任不在时由王先生代理。

questions.question: He was ______ with the question.
questions.cn: 他被这个问题难住了。

questions.question: He ______ his studies, although he is ill.
questions.cn: 虽然他病了,但仍坚持他的学业。

questions.question: ______ the things you want to keep.
questions.cn: 把你要保存的东西整理好。

questions.question: You'd better send someone to ______ the problem.
questions.cn: 你最好派一个人来解决问题。

questions.question: He ______ of succeeding in the experiment.
questions.cn: 他有可能实验成功。

questions.question: We were amazed by the rich variety of commodities ______.
questions.cn: 展出的商品种类繁多,使我们非常惊异。

questions.question: He spoke to me ______ reproach.
questions.cn: 他用谴责的言词对我说话。

questions.question: He showed great bravery ______ danger.
questions.cn: 他面对危险时表现得非常勇敢。

questions.question: He can't drive a car, ______ a truck.
questions.cn: 他不会开小轿车,更不用说开卡车了。

questions.question: I ______ a chance to visit Switzerland.
questions.cn: 我渴望有机会访问瑞士。

questions.question: I am ______ hearing from you again.
questions.cn: 我期待着再接到你的信。

questions.question: Does it ______ to let children play with matches?
questions.cn: 让小孩玩火柴明智吗?

questions.question: When I came, I found him ______ in the room.
questions.cn: 当我来时,我发现他在房间里睡觉。

questions.question: Even if it ______ tomorrow, we'll go to the movies.
questions.cn: 即使明天下雨,我们也要去看电影。

questions.question: If he ______ more money, would he buy a dictionary?
questions.cn: 如果他有更多的钱,他会买一本字典吗?

questions.question: I have been in ______ with him for years.
questions.cn: 我与他通信多年了。

questions.question: They are always ______ welcomed wherever they go.
questions.cn: 无论他们走到哪里都受到热烈欢迎。

questions.question: Traveling as well as reading ______ a person's mind.
questions.cn: 旅行和阅读一样,可以拓宽一个人的思惟。

questions.question: He ran so fast as ______ in first.
questions.cn: 他跑得很快第一个就进来了。

questions.question: I have no choice but ______ out.
questions.cn: 我没有别的选择只有去外面吃饭。

questions.question: I don't go to the movies very often, just ______.
questions.cn: 我并不经常去看电影,只是偶尔才去。

questions.question: Can you tell me the ______ of typhoon?
questions.cn: 你能告诉我台风的形成吗?

header: 英语语法提高练习题（六）

questions.question: I know you have the idea of ______ a lie.
questions.cn: 我知道你有了撒谎的想法。

questions.question: Do we have ______ money for the trip?
questions.cn: 我们有足够的钱旅行吗?

questions.question: There is no time for me ______ at scenes.
questions.cn: 我没有时间观看景色。

questions.question: He is interested in studying the ______ of birds.
questions.cn: 他对研究鸟的飞行很感兴趣。

questions.question: What do you mean by ______ at your son?
questions.cn: 你对儿子大吼大叫是什么意思?

questions.question: ______ at a stranger means acting kind toward him.
questions.cn: 对一个陌生的人微笑意味着对他友善。

questions.question: In ______ everything, you should always do your best.
questions.cn: 无论做什么事,你都要尽力而为。

questions.question: Health is a ______ that money cannot buy.
questions.cn: 健康是金钱买不来的幸福。

questions.question: Laughter can give us ______ of body and mind.
questions.cn: 笑能给我们的身体和心智带来健康。

questions.question: He insisted on ______ there regardless of my advice.
questions.cn: 他不顾我的忠告坚持要去那里。

questions.question: This solution plays a large part in mutual ______.
questions.cn: 这项解决方案对相互的利益很有影响。

questions.question: How often does a comet make its ______?
questions.cn: 彗星多久才出现一次?

questions.question: Roses are often used as a ______ of love.
questions.cn: 玫瑰花常被用作爱情的象征。

questions.question: Do you think the museum is worthy of ______?
questions.cn: 你认为这个博物馆值得参观吗?

questions.question: The damage caused by the fire ______.
questions.cn: 由这场火灾所造成的损害被减少到最低程度。

questions.question: On ______ the news, Tom burst into tears.
questions.cn: 一听到这个消息,汤姆就大哭起来。

questions.question: He sat on a stone with his eyes ______.
questions.cn: 他坐在石头上,闭着眼睛。

questions.question: All of them looked at the boy in ______.
questions.cn: 他们所有人都惊异地看着那个男孩。

questions.question: You must try to avoid ______ the same mistakes.
questions.cn: 你必须设法避免犯同样的错误。

questions.question: I prefer that you ______ yesterday.
questions.cn: 我宁愿你昨天就出发。

questions.question: You must have your suit ______ for this evening.
questions.cn: 为了今天的晚会你必须让人把衣服洗干净。

questions.question: I'm looking forward to ______ my family soon.
questions.cn: 我在盼望着不久见到我的家人。

questions.question: There is no use ______ over spilt milk.
questions.cn: 牛奶洒出来哭也没有用(覆水难收)。

questions.question: I tried three times, only ______ again.
questions.cn: 我尝试了三次,却又失败了。

questions.question: He tends ______ the opinions of others.
questions.cn: 他易于遵照别人的意见。

questions.question: Adults are more likely ______ emotions than children.
questions.cn: 大人比小孩更易于抑制情绪。

questions.question: I will try to persuade him ______ up the attempt.
questions.cn: 我会设法说服他放弃这项尝试。

questions.question: Goodness knows how I escape ______ like that.
questions.cn: 天晓得我如何避免了变成像那样子。

questions.question: They ______ in the river when it began to rain.
questions.cn: 他们正在河里游泳,这时天开始下雨了。

questions.question: He has worked there since the war ______.
questions.cn: 自从战争开始,他就在那里工作。

questions.question: It is ______ that he is very rich.
questions.cn: 据说他很富有。

questions.question: He ______ at by all the pupils.
questions.cn: 他受到所有学生的嘲笑。

questions.question: Joe ______ his radio when his mother came home.
questions.cn: 当乔的妈妈回家的时候,他正在修收音机。

questions.question: The students kept busy ______ a lot of homework.
questions.cn: 学生们一直忙于做很多家庭作业。

questions.question: The theater can ______ for a thousand people.
questions.cn: 这座电影院能容纳一千人。

questions.question: Mary went to help the old lady without ______.
questions.cn: 玛丽主动去帮了那个老太太。

questions.question: All the books that ______ are useful ones.
questions.cn: 所有被选中的书都是有用的。

questions.question: The young man came to the party without ______.
questions.cn: 这个年轻人不请自来参加宴会。

questions.question: Most of her money has ______ on clothes.
questions.cn: 她的大部分钱花费在衣服上。

questions.question: The teacher told him ______ his work done properly.
questions.cn: 老师告诉他要正确完成功课。

questions.question: It is ten years since she ______ for him.
questions.cn: 她已经等他十年了。

questions.question: The books you need ______ out.
questions.cn: 你要的书已经卖完了。

questions.question: When they ______ their seats, the film started.
questions.cn: 他们就座后,电影开始了。

questions.question: Since he came here last September, we ______ happy.
questions.cn: 自从去年九月他来到这里,我们一直很快乐。

questions.question: It ______ when they left the station.
questions.cn: 他们离开车站的时候,天正下着雨。

questions.question: He wanted to know what ______ there.
questions.cn: 他想知道那里发生了什么。

questions.question: Just as we ______ the house, it began to rain.
questions.cn: 正当我们要出门的时候,开始下雨了。

questions.question: He ______ to see the exhibition.
questions.cn: 他正被带去看展览。

questions.question: I am not so ______ a player as any of you.
questions.cn: 我打球不如你们中的任何一个好。

questions.question: He is in the ______ of good health.
questions.cn: 他享有健康。

header: 英语语法提高练习题（七）

questions.question: He worked the most, and yet was paid ______.
questions.cn: 他做的最多,但报酬却最少。

questions.question: The older we grow, the ______ our memory will become.
questions.cn: 我们的年龄越大记忆力就越差。

questions.question: They ______ for fifteen years by tomorrow.
questions.cn: 到明天他们将已经教书十五年了。

questions.question: He made an excellent ______ upon Mrs. Smith.
questions.cn: 他给史密斯太太留下了很好的印象。

questions.question: You should ______ your children to behave well.
questions.cn: 你应该教育孩子规矩一些。

questions.question: The apple trees ______ well this year.
questions.cn: 今年苹果树结了很多的苹果。

questions.question: They ______ us by laughing at everything we said.
questions.cn: 他们嘲笑我们说的每一句话以羞辱我们。

questions.question: It's ______ to expect him to help us.
questions.cn: 指望他帮助我们是没用的。

questions.question: Will you ______ me in drinking a glass of wine?
questions.cn: 你陪我喝杯酒好吗?

questions.question: All her time goes into ______ her old father.
questions.cn: 她所有的时间都用来照顾她年迈的父亲。

questions.question: I ______ his promotion for he is too young.
questions.cn: 我反对他的升职因为他太年轻了。

questions.question: She wants me to go on with ______.
questions.cn: 她要我继续绘画。

questions.question: Since his wife died his life has had no ______.
questions.cn: 自从他的妻子去世以后,他的生活失去了意义。

questions.question: The new neighbor seems to ______ now.
questions.cn: 新来的邻居似乎已经安顿好了。

questions.question: There is a ______ corner in the garden.
questions.cn: 花园里有一个阴凉的角落。

questions.question: There was a garden on the ______ side of the street.
questions.cn: 街道对面有一座花园。

questions.question: They suddenly realized how far they ______.
questions.cn: 他们突然意识到了他们已经向前走了多么远。

questions.question: ______ someone is to calm his fears.
questions.cn: 安慰某人就是消除他的恐惧心理。

questions.question: I'm sorry; I didn't mean to hurt your ______.
questions.cn: 对不起,我没有伤害你感情的意思。

questions.question: Let's ask for his ______ on what to do next.
questions.cn: 我们征求一下他的意见,看下一步该怎么办。

questions.question: I haven't been to the movies much ______.
questions.cn: 我最近很少看电影。

questions.question: Never had I seen anything so ______ as that.
questions.cn: 我从来没见过这么好的东西。

questions.question: If you have different opinion, just say it ______.
questions.cn: 如果你有不同意见,就大声讲出来。

questions.question: Li Ping is the ______ man I want to see.
questions.cn: 李平是我最不想见的人。

questions.question: We had to dig ______ to get water.
questions.cn: 为了要找到水,我们不得不挖得很深。

questions.question: He went on studying ______ into the night.
questions.cn: 他读书一直到深夜。

questions.question: This pen is the same ______ as that one.
questions.cn: 这枝笔和那枝笔长度相同。

questions.question: Which do you think tastes ______, the chicken or the fish?
questions.cn: 鸡和鱼你认为那个味道好?

questions.question: ______ do you think will come tomorrow?
questions.cn: 你认为明天谁会来?

questions.question: You are ______ me for five thousand dollars.
questions.cn: 你欠我五千元。

questions.question: We had several cups of coffee after we finished ______.
questions.cn: 我们吃完饭以后喝了几杯咖啡。

questions.question: Time cured him ______ his grief.
questions.cn: 时间治愈了他的伤痛。

questions.question: We are ashamed of his ______ conduct.
questions.cn: 我们对他令人懊悔的行为感到羞耻。

questions.question: The accident was ______ the driver's carelessness.
questions.cn: 事故是由司机的疏忽大意造成的。

questions.question: The rich are not necessarily generous ______ money.
questions.cn: 有钱人未必花钱大方。

questions.question: They have made my life ______ living.
questions.cn: 他们使我的生活富有价值。

questions.question: I will never forget the favor you ______ me.
questions.cn: 我永远不会忘记你对我的恩情。

questions.question: The speech she ______ touched those people present.
questions.cn: 她发表的演讲打动了那些在场的人们。

questions.question: The coat will stand no more ______.
questions.cn: 这件外衣再也经不住磨损了。

questions.question: I was too little to ______ the telephone.
questions.cn: 我个子太小构不到电话。

questions.question: I came near ______ taken in.
questions.cn: 我差点被骗。

questions.question: If they work ______, they will succeed.
questions.cn: 如果他们认真地工作,他们就会成功。

questions.question: We cannot afford ______ such a high price.
questions.cn: 我们无法支付这样高的价格。

questions.question: When I left home yesterday morning, it was quite ______.
questions.cn: 昨天早上我出门的时候,天气相当暖和。

questions.question: But in the afternoon, the temperature ______ sharply.
questions.cn: 但是到了下午,气温却急速下降了。

questions.question: How I wish I ______ often go to the mountain!
questions.cn: 如果能常常到山上去,那该多好啊!

questions.question: I can ______ believe I have been so lucky this month.
questions.cn: 我几乎不敢相信我这个月是如此的幸运。

questions.question: Young people are quite ______ their parents.
questions.cn: 年青人和他们父母亲那一辈相当不同。

questions.question: To ______, summer is really a good time for recreation.
questions.cn: 总之,夏天真是个休闲的好时光。

questions.question: You can leave the work of painting ______ him.
questions.cn: 你可以把油漆的工作留给他。

header: 英语语法提高练习题（八）

questions.question: ______ all the four seasons, summer is the hottest.
questions.cn: 在所有四季当中,夏天最热。

questions.question: He came back ______ his pocket full of money.
questions.cn: 他回来了,口袋装满了钱。

questions.question: What do you mean ______ giving up all your chances?
questions.cn: 你把所有机会都放弃了是什么意思?

questions.question: We had better ______ what the teacher says in class.
questions.cn: 我们最好记下老师上课所说的。

questions.question: The school is named ______ its founder, Mr. Johnson.
questions.cn: 这学校是以其创办人詹森先生的姓氏命名的。

questions.question: ______ last year did he find a job.
questions.cn: 直到去年他才找到工作。

questions.question: I ______ stay at home than go to the cinema.
questions.cn: 我宁愿待在家里,也不要去看电影。

questions.question: Wherever we are, we should ______ our country.
questions.cn: 无论身处何方,我们应以祖国为荣。

questions.question: He has ______ to defeat his opponent.
questions.cn: 他已下定决心要打败对手。
options: A. made up for his mind

questions.question: He is bound to get ______.
questions.cn: 他一定会搞糊涂的。

questions.question: I was away ______ the other day.
questions.cn: 几天前我因公在外。

questions.question: ______ had I arrived than he had to go.
questions.cn: 我刚到,他就得走了。

questions.question: This article is ______ being read carefully.
questions.cn: 这篇文章值得仔细阅读。

questions.question: I began to ______ at the age of five.
questions.cn: 我五岁开始学钢琴。

questions.question: If it were summer vacation now, we ______.
questions.cn: 假如现在是暑假,我们就能去游泳。

questions.question: Children start getting ______ by watching and listening.
questions.cn: 孩子透过看和听开始获得知识。

questions.question: Have you ever gone ______ in the lake?
questions.cn: 你曾经去湖里钓鱼吗?

questions.question: Would you all like ______ swimming tomorrow afternoon?
questions.cn: 你们大家明天下午想去游泳吗?

questions.question: I'd love to fix the tape recorder by ______.
questions.cn: 我很想自己修理这录音机。

questions.question: Teachers and students should know ______ names.
questions.cn: 老师和学生应该知道彼此的名字。

questions.question: It is nice ______ you to buy me some beef jerky.
questions.cn: 承蒙你的好意买了一些牛肉干给我。

questions.question: Neither you nor he ______ wash the floor.
questions.cn: 你和他都不必洗地板。

questions.question: He gets up early ______ he may catch the bus.
questions.cn: 他起得早为了可以赶上那班公车。

questions.question: Whom do you like best among film ______?
questions.cn: 在电影男演员中,你最喜欢谁?

questions.question: You don't have to spend time ______ up these words.
questions.cn: 你不必花费时间查阅这些单字。

questions.question: Why did you take Tom's flashlight without ______ him first?
questions.cn: 你为什么没有先问汤姆就拿走他的手电筒?

questions.question: You wouldn't mind if I watch you practice today, ______?
questions.cn: 你们不介意我今天看你们练习,是吧?

questions.question: What do you usually feel like doing when you ______?
questions.cn: 当你无聊时,你通常想做什么事?

questions.question: When you are very angry, you had better ______.
questions.cn: 当你很生气时,你最好忍住不说。

questions.question: This English book is ______ for me to read.
questions.cn: 这本英语书对我来说很难读懂。

questions.question: I'll go to ______ my teacher this Sunday afternoon.
questions.cn: 这个星期天下午,我要去拜访我的老师。

questions.question: My mother was busy ______ the clothes at that time.
questions.cn: 在那时候我妈妈正忙着洗衣服。

questions.question: She speaks English ______ to teach me.
questions.cn: 她英语讲得好地足够可以教我。

questions.question: She was my neighbor last year, so I ______ her.
questions.cn: 她去年是我的邻居,所以我认识她。

questions.question: He had tests in English and math two days ______.
questions.cn: 两天以前他有过一次英语考试和数学考试。

questions.question: She ______ to read the book which is exciting.
questions.cn: 她喜爱阅读这本令人兴奋的书。

questions.question: After ______ your exercises, you may go to play outside.
questions.cn: 完成你的练习后,你可以去外面玩。

questions.question: I was too tired to work on, and so was ______.
questions.cn: 我太累了无法继续工作,他也是。

questions.question: This is the magazine ______ I bought yesterday.
questions.cn: 这是我昨天买的杂志。

questions.question: ______ which I wore ten years ago.
questions.cn: 这里有我十年前穿过的一件夹克。

questions.question: The teacher loves his students, and ______ by them.
questions.cn: 老师爱护学生,也被学生所爱戴。

questions.question: By which team ______ the game won?
questions.cn: 哪个队赢了这场比赛?

questions.question: Did you watch the game at home ______ yesterday?
questions.cn: 昨天在家你从电视上观看那场比赛了吗?

questions.question: I become tired very ______ during this week.
questions.cn: 这个星期中,我很容易变得疲倦。

questions.question: He ______ that I didn't break the record last time.
questions.cn: 他抱怨我上次没有打破记录。

questions.question: She is ______ young that she looks quite like a child.
questions.cn: 她如此的年轻,以致于看起来很像个孩子。

questions.question: I haven't seen Mark ______ he returned from San Francisco.
questions.cn: 自从马克从旧金山回来,我还没见过他。

questions.question: My teacher told me ______ my homework carefully.
questions.cn: 我的老师曾告诉我要认真写作业。

questions.question: Our dream will not come true without ______.
questions.cn: 不付出辛勤的劳动,我们的梦想是不会实现的。

questions.question: The doctor told me to take care of ______.
questions.cn: 医生曾告诉我要注意自己的身体。

header: 英语语法提高练习题（九）

questions.question: He spoke ______ fast that we couldn't understand what he said.
questions.cn: 他说得那么快,我们听不懂他说什么。

questions.question: I ______ spending a lot of time shopping.
questions.cn: 我讨厌花费许多时间购物。

questions.question: Eating sweet food can make us fat ______.
questions.cn: 吃甜的食品更容易使我们发胖。

questions.question: She was ______ frightened to speak, wasn't she?
questions.cn: 她被吓得说不出话来,是吗?

questions.question: The town ______ he lives is far from here.
questions.cn: 他所居住的市镇离此很远。

questions.question: Do you know how we can ______?
questions.cn: 你知道怎样能使他高兴起来吗?

questions.question: They have already ______ for their winter vacation.
questions.cn: 他们已经拟定了许多寒假计画。

questions.question: Not only he but also you ______ wrong.
questions.cn: 不但他错,而且你也错。

questions.question: Something surprising happened ______ him yesterday.
questions.cn: 昨天在他身上发生了一件令人惊奇的事情。

questions.question: A lot of people moved from ______ to the city.
questions.cn: 很多人由乡下迁移到都市。

questions.question: There is ______ about the way he spoke.
questions.cn: 他说话的方式有些不可思议。

questions.question: She is ______ of the four girls.
questions.cn: 她是这四位女孩中最快乐的。

questions.question: I think I can finish ______ the book this week.
questions.cn: 我认为我能在这星期看完这本书。

questions.question: We listened to him ______ a story last night.
questions.cn: 我们昨晚听他讲了一个故事。

questions.question: They ______ us with a visit last night.
questions.cn: 昨晚他们突然来访,使我们惊讶。

questions.question: I think the government must ______ something about the problem.
questions.cn: 我想政府必须采取措施解决这个问题。

questions.question: Neither John's father ______ mine could understand the problem.
questions.cn: 约翰的父亲和我的父亲都弄不懂这个问题。

questions.question: All that you have to do is ______ my house.
questions.cn: 你只要照顾好我的家就行了。

questions.question: When we had finished ______, the waiter brought the bill.
questions.cn: 我们吃完以后,侍者拿来帐单。

questions.question: If it ______ summer vacation, we couldn't go traveling.
questions.cn: 如果不是暑假,我们就不能去旅游了。

questions.question: Rick bothered me ______ some fruit for him.
questions.cn: 瑞克缠着我给他买水果。

questions.question: Working on the ocean ______ dangerous.
questions.cn: 海上的工作有时会有危险。

questions.question: When do you usually have your clothes ______?
questions.cn: 你通常什么时间洗衣服?

questions.question: The food ______ from that store is very fresh.
questions.cn: 从那家商店买的食物都佷新鲜。

questions.question: Not only he but also his parents ______ kind to me.
questions.cn: 他和他的父母对我都很好。

questions.question: ______ that Rick is going to Germany next month.
questions.cn: 瑞克真的下个月要去德国。

questions.question: She lives in the house, ______ is clean and beautiful.
questions.cn: 她住的房子既干净又漂亮。

questions.question: They will set off as soon as it stops ______.
questions.cn: 雨一停他们就出发。

questions.question: My father asked where my friend ______ before.
questions.cn: 我父亲问我的朋友以前住在哪里。

questions.question: Jill doesn't play the piano so ______ as her brother.
questions.cn: 吉尔不如她兄弟钢琴弹得好。

questions.question: Time ______, I'll go on a picnic with you this Sunday.
questions.cn: 假如时间允许,这个星期天我就和你去野餐。

questions.question: Spring ______, the trees begin to turn green.
questions.cn: 春天来了,树木开始变绿了。

questions.question: It was the cat that ______ that beautiful vase.
questions.cn: 是这只猫打碎了那个漂亮的花瓶。

questions.question: ______ interest rates will undoubtedly pull down stock prices.
questions.cn: 提高利率无疑会将股票价格拉下来。

questions.question: ______ the server could operate more efficiently.
questions.cn: 除非伺服器效率能高一些。

questions.question: Confucius was not only a great educator ______ a well-known thinker.
questions.cn: 孔子不仅是伟大的教育家,也是着名的思想家。

questions.question: Unlike most ______ people, I feel most vigorous in the evening.
questions.cn: 我与众不同,晚上精力最充沛。

questions.question: It's the unique Internet address ______ to every web site.
questions.cn: 它是分配给因特网上每个网站的惟一网址。

questions.question: It represents a job opportunity for IT people, ______?
questions.cn: 对IT人士来说,它代表了择业的机会,不是吗?

questions.question: I hope it's not ______ your wife that you don't drink.
questions.cn: 我希望并不是因为你的妻子才不喝酒的。

questions.question: But I think we should ______ the professors involved.
questions.cn: 但我想我们还应该就这一问题征询有关的教授们的意见。
options: C. refer to this issue to
D. refer to this issue from

questions.question: Most investors predict corporate profits ______ be disappointing.
questions.cn: 多数投资人预计公司盈利将令人失望。

questions.question: Mount Putuo is ______ the four mountains held sacred by Buddhists in China.
questions.cn: 普陀山是中国四大佛教名山之一。

questions.question: Wildlife has suffered ______ human beings and their activities.
questions.cn: 人类及其活动使野生动物饱受苦难。

questions.question: Transit passengers ______ go through transit formalities.
questions.cn: 过境旅客须办过境手续。

questions.question: Venture capital ______ a very important part in the development of hi-tech industry.
questions.cn: 风险投资在高科技产业的发展中起着重要的作用。

questions.question: It ______ hard disk, perhaps your password is not correct.
questions.cn: 这和硬碟没有关系,也许你的密码有误。
options: A. has nothing to do with
B. has something to do with
C. has nothing to do in
D. has something to do in

questions.question: ______ the call comes, I'll let you know over the microphone.
questions.cn: 接通时,我会用广播叫你的。

questions.question: Countless web sites in the world ______ the contents of the Internet.
questions.cn: 全世界无数的网站构成了因特网的内容。

questions.question: There is considerable room ______ improvement indeed.
questions.cn: 确实有很大的提升余地。

header: 英语语法提高练习题（十）

questions.question: Such a wind is usually the result ______ convection currents.
questions.cn: 这种风通常是由气流传递引起的。

questions.question: There is a Web page address where you can know ______.
questions.cn: 有个网址你可以查一下,能够了解她的近况。

questions.question: It is a rare treat ______ a glimpse of a wild animal.
questions.cn: 看一眼野生动物真是难得的乐事。

questions.question: The stock ______ dropped a dollar a share yesterday.
questions.cn: 我买的股票昨天每股跌了一元。

questions.question: The slowdown of the economy ______ Japanese firms.
questions.cn: 经济衰退一直在损害日本公司。

questions.question: I suppose we ______ arm airline crews.
questions.cn: 我认为我们应该把飞机机组人员武装起来。

questions.question: It's a marvelous idea, ______, but it may not be feasible.
questions.cn: 我相信这倒是个好主意,不过也许行不通。

questions.question: And it's ______ for telephone and television transmissions.
questions.cn: 而且它非常适合于各种类型的电话及电视的传输。

questions.question: I would like to have a fine art photograph ______ of myself.
questions.cn: 我想给自己拍一张艺术照。

questions.question: B-share index ______ more than 140 percent.
questions.cn: B股指数已猛涨了百分之一百四十多。

questions.question: They have trouble ______ legal support when relationships break down.
questions.cn: 关系破裂时他们很难获得法律上的援助。

questions.question: Take trolley bus Number 76 ______ get off at the next stop.
questions.cn: 乘７６路电车,在下一站下车。

questions.question: It confirmed suspicions ______ DNA carries life's hereditary information.
questions.cn: 它印证了人们对DNA携带遗传信息的怀疑。

questions.question: Get off at the 4th stop and then change to the No. 61 bus ______ north.
questions.cn: 到第四站下车,然后换乘向北的６１路公车。

questions.question: People have opportunities to get educated ______ the help of the Internet.
questions.cn: 人们有机会借助网际网路接受教育。

questions.question: Since its outbreak, AIDS ______ more than 22 million people.
questions.cn: 自从其爆发以来,爱滋病已经使二千二百多万人丧生。

questions.question: If I ______ in your shoes, I'd consult Professor Smith.
questions.cn: 如果我处于你的位置,我会请教史密斯教授。

questions.question: You'd get a clearer picture if you ______ an outside antenna.
questions.cn: 如果你有一条室外天线,你会看到较清晰的画面。

questions.question: Mr. Hill doesn't like all the time she ______ on the computer.
questions.cn: 希尔先生不喜欢她把所有时间都花在电脑上。

questions.question: That really ______ the rest of the components in your PC.
questions.cn: 那就看你个人电脑的其他元器件了。

questions.question: That country lacked an ______ forestry policy.
questions.cn: 那个国家缺乏有效的长期林业政策。

questions.question: The Internet is probably ______ network in the world.
questions.cn: 网际网路可能是世界上最开放的网路了。

questions.question: That's the reason ______ thousands of sheep could probably be slaughtered.
questions.cn: 那就是为什么上千只羊可能要被宰杀的原因。

questions.question: The best way ______ your PC is probably over an online auction site.
questions.cn: 最佳的出售你的旧电脑的方法也许就是通过在线拍卖网站。

questions.question: I would usually choose apples ______ pears.
questions.cn: 我通常愿意选择苹果,其次才是梨。

questions.question: I'm afraid you are expected ______ the electricity.
questions.cn: 恐怕你该付电费了。

questions.question: People who enjoy ______ sports are usually healthy.
questions.cn: 喜欢参加体育运动的人通常是健康的。

questions.question: A laser printer has a ______ resolution for images.
questions.cn: 镭射印表机的图像解析度较高。

questions.question: The problem becomes significant ______ the industrial revolution.
questions.cn: 自工业革命以来这个问题变得突出了。

questions.question: Some people like horseback riding, but I prefer ______.
questions.cn: 有的人喜欢骑马,而我喜欢打高尔夫球。

questions.question: The company declared a large dividend ______ the year.
questions.cn: 公司在年底宣布红利甚丰。

questions.question: It's an American slang which ______ disc jockey.
questions.cn: 这是一个美国俚语,指的是唱片音乐节目主持人。

questions.question: It's ridiculous for you ______ weight, you are really thin.
questions.cn: 你减肥真是太荒唐了,你真的很瘦。

questions.question: It's for you ______ a decision when to set off.
questions.cn: 什么时候出发由你决定。

questions.question: Don't worry, we'll ______ them some tricks.
questions.cn: 别急,咱们给他们露两手看看。

questions.question: It's said to open ______ nine thirty in the morning.
questions.cn: 据说是在上午九点三十分开。

questions.question: I think the new rules will ______ the players.
questions.cn: 我认为新规则会束缚球员。

questions.question: Just follow me. I'll show you ______ department store here.
questions.cn: 跟我走好了。我会为你们介绍本地最有名的百货公司。

questions.question: Just leave the shoes outside the door before ______.
questions.cn: 只要在睡觉前把鞋放在门外就行了。

questions.question: Sorry, we don't have ______. You'd better go to the stationery store.
questions.cn: 对不起,我们这里没有。你最好到文具店去买。

questions.question: I'm afraid we ______ wash and iron embroidered items.
questions.cn: 恐怕我们不能洗熨绣花衣物。

questions.question: The ______ lady is to be played by a character actress.
questions.cn: 女主角将由一位性格演员担任。

questions.question: If I ______ in your position, I'd think twice about that.
questions.cn: 如果我处在你的地位,我会考虑得更周全一些。

questions.question: I'm sorry, but my computer ______ work very well now.
questions.cn: 对不起,但是我的电脑现在不是很好用。

questions.question: I've got the runs, probably because of the food ______.
questions.cn: 我拉肚子了,大概是食物中毒。

questions.question: If I ______ your grandfather, I'd go there with him.
questions.cn: 如果我是你祖父的话,我会同他一起去那里。

questions.question: It's a new technology ______ short-range wireless communications.
questions.cn: 它是一种新的短距离无线电通讯技术。

questions.question: There's no doubt ______, but how could we persuade the manager?
questions.cn: 毫无疑问,但是我们如何才能说服经理呢?

questions.question: I owe it to all my friends ______ helped me so much.
questions.cn: 我把它归功于曾经大力帮助过我的所有朋友。

questions.question: I am quite confident ______ the racial discrimination problem will be solved.
questions.cn: 我很有信心种族歧视问题会解决的。

header: 英语语法提高练习题（十一）

questions.question: How will you spend the money ______ you win in the lottery?
questions.cn: 如果你中彩了怎么花那笔钱?

questions.question: So there's a need for a faster ______ communications technology.
questions.cn: 所以需要一种更快的无线通信技术。

questions.question: They suggested that we should go to a dentist ______ Bill.
questions.cn: 他们建议我们去看一位叫做比尔的牙医。

questions.question: The longer walks can make the heart ten years ______.
questions.cn: 长距离步行可以使人的心脏年轻十年。
